searchEngine

Interface SearchEngine


  • public interface SearchEngine
    Interface describing the basic functionalities of a textual search engine.
    Author:
    Pierre Tirilly - pierre.tirilly@telecom-lille.fr

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Vector<DocumentInfo> getDatabase()
      Returns the content of the database indexed by the search engine.
      void loadDatabaseFile(java.io.File databaseFile)
      Loads the database as described in an XML file.
      java.util.Vector<DocumentInfo> queryDatabase(java.lang.String query)
      Searches the database for documents that are similar to the query provided.

    • Method Detail

      • getDatabase

        java.util.Vector<DocumentInfo> getDatabase()
        Returns the content of the database indexed by the search engine.
        Returns:
        A vector of DocumentInfo-derived objects representing the documents indexed by the search Engine.

      • loadDatabaseFile

        void loadDatabaseFile(java.io.File databaseFile)
        Loads the database as described in an XML file.
        Parameters:
        databaseFile - The file containing the XML description of the database.

      • queryDatabase

        java.util.Vector<DocumentInfo> queryDatabase(java.lang.String query)
        Searches the database for documents that are similar to the query provided. The search results are sorted in decreasing order of similarity to the query.
        Parameters:
        query - The query data as a string.
        Returns:
        A vector of documents (described as DocumentInfo objects) in decreasing order of similarity.
